message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $9,500.  I believe it offers significant value at this price, especially considering its worth to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $8,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your desire for a lower price, but $8,500 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $9,000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am unable to meet your current offer of $9,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,750. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
